name: compassQuery.html
template:
<html>

    <head>
        <title>Compass Query Connector</title>
        <meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-store" />
        <link href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.6/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" integrity="sha384-1q8mTJOASx8j1Au+a5WDVnPi2lkFfwwEAa8hDDdjZlpLegxhjVME1fgjWPGmkzs7" crossorigin="anonymous">
        <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.11.1/jquery.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
        <script src="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.3.6/js/bootstrap.min.js" integrity="sha384-0mSbJDEHialfmuBBQP6A4Qrprq5OVfW37PRR3j5ELqxss1yVqOtnepnHVP9aJ7xS" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
        <script src="https://connectors.tableau.com/libs/tableauwdc-2.1.1.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
        <script src="//rawgithub.com/indrimuska/jquery-editable-select/master/dist/jquery-editable-select.min.js"></script>
        <link href="//rawgithub.com/indrimuska/jquery-editable-select/master/dist/jquery-editable-select.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
        <script src="https://unpkg.com/sweetalert/dist/sweetalert.min.js"></script>
        <script src="/compassWDCJs" type="text/javascript"></script>
    </head>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function() {
            var clicked = false;
            const debug = false;

        $("#node-input-appList").click(function() {
			$("#node-input-app").val("empty");
            $("#node-input-error").val("empty");
			$("#node-input-queryList").val("");
		
            var host = $("#node-input-host").val();
            var port = parseInt($("#node-input-port").val(), 10);
            if(port && host.length > 0) {
                getRepos(host, port);
            }
            clicked = true;
        });

        $("#node-input-app").change(function() {
            // translate app combo into separate db and repo
            var app = $("#node-input-app").val();
            var appArray = app.split('-');
			if(clicked && app !== "empty") {
				$("#node-input-repo").val(appArray[0]).trigger('change');
				$("#node-input-db").val(appArray[1]).trigger('change');
			}
        });
                        
        $("#node-input-repo").change(function() {
            $("#node-input-error").val("empty");
            var port = parseInt($("#node-input-port").val(), 10);
            var host = $("#node-input-host").val();
            var repo = $("#node-input-repo").val();
            var db = $("#node-input-db").val();
            var username = $("#node-input-username").val();
            var password = $("#node-input-password").val();
            var token = $("#node-input-token").val();
            var error = $("#node-input-error").val();
            if(port && error == "empty"){
                if(host.length > 0 && repo.length > 0 && db.length > 0 && username.length > 0) {
                    getToken(host, port, repo, db, username, password);
                }
            }
        });
                        
        $("#node-input-db").change(function() {
            $("#node-input-error").val("empty");
            var port = parseInt($("#node-input-port").val(), 10);
            var host = $("#node-input-host").val();
            var repo = $("#node-input-repo").val();
            var db = $("#node-input-db").val();
            var username = $("#node-input-username").val();
            var password = $("#node-input-password").val();
            var token = $("#node-input-token").val();	
            var error = $("#node-input-error").val();			
            if(port && token == 0 && error == "empty"){
                if(host.length > 0 && repo.length > 0 && db.length > 0 && username.length > 0) {
                    getToken(host, port, repo, db, username, password);
                }
            }
        });
                        
        $("#node-input-username").change(function() {
            $("#node-input-error").val("empty");
            var port = parseInt($("#node-input-port").val(), 10);
            var host = $("#node-input-host").val();
            var repo = $("#node-input-repo").val();
            var db = $("#node-input-db").val();
            var username = $("#node-input-username").val();
            var password = $("#node-input-password").val();
            var token = $("#node-input-token").val();	
            var error = $("#node-input-error").val();				
            if(port && token == 0 && error == "empty"){
                if(host.length > 0 && repo.length > 0 && db.length > 0 && username.length > 0 ) {
                    getToken(host, port, repo, db, username, password);
                }
            }
        });
                        
        $("#node-input-password").change(function() {
            $("#node-input-error").val("empty");
            var port = parseInt($("#node-input-port").val(), 10);
            var host = $("#node-input-host").val();
            var repo = $("#node-input-repo").val();
            var db = $("#node-input-db").val();
            var username = $("#node-input-username").val();
            var password = $("#node-input-password").val();
            var token = $("#node-input-token").val();	
            var error = $("#node-input-error").val();
				
            if(port && token == 0 && error == "empty"){
                if(host.length > 0 && repo.length > 0 && db.length > 0 && username.length > 0 ) {
                    getToken(host, port, repo, db, username, password);
                }
            }
        });
        
        $("#node-input-token").change(function() {
            $("#node-input-error").val("empty");
            var port = parseInt($("#node-input-port").val(), 10);
            var host = $("#node-input-host").val();
            var repo = $("#node-input-repo").val();
            var db = $("#node-input-db").val();
            var token = $("#node-input-token").val();
            var error = $("#node-input-error").val();
			var app = $("#node-input-app").val();

            if(port && clicked && error == "empty" && app !== "empty") {
				if(host.length > 0 && repo.length > 0 && db.length > 0 && token !== 0) {
                    getRootFolders(host, port, repo, db, token);
				}
            }
        });

        $("#node-input-folderDbId").change(function() {
            if($("#node-input-showerror").val() == "1") {
				$("#node-input-errorMsg").val("");
            }	
            var port = parseInt($("#node-input-port").val(), 10);
			var host = $("#node-input-host").val();
			var repo = $("#node-input-repo").val();
			var db = $("#node-input-db").val();
			var token = $("#node-input-token").val();
            var app = $("#node-input-app").val();
            var folderDbId = $("#node-input-folderDbId").val();
            var error = $("#node-input-error").val();

            if(port && clicked && error == "empty" && app !== "empty") {
                if(host.length > 0 && repo.length > 0 && db.length > 0 && token !== 0 && folderDbId.length > 0) {
                    populateList(host, port, repo, db, token, folderDbId);
                }
            }
        });

        // display log messages if debug is true
        function log(message) {
            if(debug) {
                console.log(message);
            }
        }
        // do request call to get token
        function getToken(host, port, repo, db, username, password) {
            log("Getting token...");
            var error = true;
            var xmlHttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
            var url = "https://"+host+":"+port+"/ccmweb/rest/authenticate";	
																		 
            var data = ({"username": username, "password": password, "repo": repo, "db": db});
            var replacer = function (key, value) {
                return typeof value === 'undefined' ? "" : value;
            }
            var result = JSON.stringify(data, replacer);
            log(result);
            xmlHttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
                log(xmlHttp.responseText);
                if(xmlHttp.readyState == 4 && xmlHttp.status == 201) {
                    error = false;
                    var json = JSON.parse(xmlHttp.responseText);
                    $("#node-input-token").val(json.token).trigger('change');
                }
                else if(xmlHttp.readyState == 4 && error) {
                    var errorMessage;
                    if(xmlHttp.status == 401) {
                        errorMessage = "Error message received was: Unauthorized."
                    }
                    else if(xmlHttp.status == 400) {
                        errorMessage = "Error message received was: Invalid login request.";
                    }
                    else if(xmlHttp.status == 403) {
                        errorMessage = "Error message received was: Forbidden.";
                    }
                    else if(xmlHttp.status == 404) {
                        errorMessage = "Error message received was: Not Found.";
                    }
                    else if(xmlHttp.status > 299 || xmlHttp.status < 200) {
                        errorMessage = "Please check input and try again.";
                    }
                    if(xmlHttp.status == 0) {
                        swal("Error", "An error occurred. " + errorMessage, "error");
                        $("#node-input-error").val("An error occurred. " + errorMessage);
                    }
                    else {
                        swal("Error", "An error occurred. Request returned status code: " +  xmlHttp.status + "\n" + errorMessage, "error");
                        $("#node-input-error").val("An error occurred. Request returned status code: " +  xmlHttp.status + "\n" + errorMessage);
                    }
                }
            }
            try {
                xmlHttp.open("POST", url, true); // true for asynchronous 
                xmlHttp.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
                xmlHttp.send(result);
            } catch(e) {
                log(e);
            }
        }
                
        function getRepos(host, port){
            log("Getting repositories and databases...");
            var error = true;
            var xmlHttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
            // sending true to get database names
            var getDbs = true;
            var url = "https://"+host+":"+port+"/ccmweb/rest/repos?getDbs="+getDbs;
															   
            var data = {"getDbs": getDbs};
                    
            xmlHttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
                log(xmlHttp.responseText);
                if(xmlHttp.readyState == 4 && xmlHttp.status == 200){
                    error = false;
                    var json = JSON.parse(xmlHttp.responseText);
										   
										  
                    var options = '';
                    var selectedApp;
                    var storedApp = $("#node-input-app").val();
                     	

                        for(i in json) {
                            if(json[i].name.length > 0 && json[i].databaseNames.length > 0) {
                                if(json[i].databaseNames.length > 1) {
                                    var repo = json[i].name;
                                    for(j in json[i].databaseNames) {
                                        options = options + '<option value="'+repo+'-' + json[i].databaseNames[j] +'">'+repo+'-'+json[i].databaseNames[j]+'</option>';
                                    }
                                } else {
                                    options = options + '<option value="'+json[i].name+'-' + json[i].databaseNames +'">'+json[i].name+'-'+json[i].databaseNames+'</option>';
                                }
                            }
						}
                    $("#node-input-appList").replaceWith(
                        '<select style="background-color: white"name="node-input-appList" id="node-input-appList" required>'
                            + options + 
                        '</select>'
                    );

                    $('#node-input-appList').editableSelect().on('select.editable-select', function(e, li) {
                        $('#node-input-appList').val(li.text());
                        $('#node-input-appList').change();
                    });
                            
                    $('#node-input-appList').change(function() {
                        for(i in json) {
							if(json[i].databaseNames.length > 1) {
                            	for(j in json[i].databaseNames) {
                            		if((json[i].name + '-' + json[i].databaseNames[j]) === $('#node-input-appList').val()) {
                            			selectedApp = json[i].name + '-' + json[i].databaseNames[j];
                            		}
                            	}
                            } else {
                            	if((json[i].name + '-' + json[i].databaseNames) === $('#node-input-appList').val()) {
                                    selectedApp = json[i].name + '-' + json[i].databaseNames;
                                }
                            }
                        }
						
                        if(selectedApp && storedApp === "empty") {
						    log("The selected app is: " + selectedApp);
                            $("#node-input-app").val(selectedApp).trigger('change');
                        }
                    });
                } 
                else if(xmlHttp.readyState == 4 && error) {
                    if(xmlHttp.status == 401) {
                        errorMessage = "Error message received was: Unauthorized."
                    }
                    else if(xmlHttp.status == 400) {
                        errorMessage = "Error message received was: Invalid login request.";
                    }
                    else if(xmlHttp.status == 403) {
                        errorMessage = "Error message received was: Forbidden.";
                    }
                    else if(xmlHttp.status == 404) {
                        errorMessage = "Error message received was: Not Found.";
                    }
                    else if(xmlHttp.status > 299 || xmlHttp.status < 200) {
                        errorMessage = "Please check input and try again.";
                    }
                    if(xmlHttp.status == 0) {
                        swal("Error", "An error occurred. " + errorMessage, "error");
                        $("#node-input-error").val("An error occurred. " + errorMessage);
                    }
                    else {
                        swal("Error", "An error occurred. Request returned status code: " +  xmlHttp.status + "\n" + errorMessage, "error");
                        $("#node-input-error").val("An error occurred. Request returned status code: " +  xmlHttp.status + "\n" + errorMessage);
                    }
                }
            }
            try {
                xmlHttp.open("GET", url, true); // true for asynchronous 
                xmlHttp.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
                xmlHttp.send(data);
            } catch(e) {
                log(e);
            }
        }

        // make request to Compass API to get available root folders to choose from
        function getRootFolders(host, port, repo, db, token) {
            var error = true;
            var xmlHttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
            var url = "https://"+host+":"+port+"/ccmweb/rest/repos/"+repo+"/databases/"+db+"/workspace/folders";
            var data = ({"repo": repo, "db": db, "token": token});

            xmlHttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
                log(xmlHttp.responseText);
                if (xmlHttp.readyState == 4 && xmlHttp.status == 200){
                    error = false;
                    var json = JSON.parse(xmlHttp.responseText);
                    var options ='';
                    for (i in json) {
                        if(json[i].name.length > 0) {
                            options = options + '<option value="'+json[i].dbId+'">'+json[i].name+'</option>';
                        }
                    }

                    $('#node-input-rootFolders').replaceWith(
        				'<select name="node-input-rootFolders" id="node-input-rootFolders" required>'
        				  	+ options + 
						'</select>'
					);
        			$('#node-input-rootFolders').editableSelect().on('select.editable-select', function(e, li) {
        				$('#node-input-rootFolders').val(li.text());
        				$('#node-input-rootFolders').change();
        			});
        				  
        			$('#node-input-rootFolders').change(function() {
                        var selectedRootFolder;
                        var folderDbId;
        				for(i in json) {
        					if(json[i].name === $('#node-input-rootFolders').val()) {
                                selectedRootFolder = json[i].name;
                                folderDbId = json[i].dbId;
        					}
        				}
        				if(selectedRootFolder) {
                            $("#node-input-folder").val(selectedRootFolder);
							$("#node-input-folderDbId").val(folderDbId).trigger('change');
        				}
					});
                } else if(xmlHttp.readyState == 4 && error) {
                    if(xmlHttp.status == 401) {
                        errorMessage = "Error message received was: Unauthorized."
                    }
                    else if(xmlHttp.status == 400) {
                        errorMessage = "Error message received was: Invalid login request.";
                    }
                    else if(xmlHttp.status == 403) {
                        errorMessage = "Error message received was: Forbidden.";
                    }
                    else if(xmlHttp.status == 404) {
                        errorMessage = "Error message received was: Not Found.";
                    }
                    else if(xmlHttp.status > 299 || xmlHttp.status < 200) {
                        errorMessage = "Please check input and try again.";
                    }
                    if(xmlHttp.status == 0) {
                        swal("Error", "An error occurred. " + errorMessage, "error");
                        $("#node-input-error").val("An error occurred. " + errorMessage);
                    }
                    else {
                        swal("Error", "An error occurred. Request returned status code: " +  xmlHttp.status + "\n" + errorMessage, "error");
                        $("#node-input-error").val("An error occurred. Request returned status code: " +  xmlHttp.status + "\n" + errorMessage);
                    }
                }
            } 
            try {
				xmlHttp.open("GET", url, true); // true for asynchronous 
				xmlHttp.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "Bearer " + token);
				xmlHttp.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
				xmlHttp.send(data);
			} catch(e) {
				log(e);
				populateErrorMsg('Request to "' + url + '" failed.');
			}	
        }

        // make request to Compass API to get list of query names available in specified root folder
        function populateList(host, port, repo, db, token, folderDbId) {
				var error = true;
            	var xmlHttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
				var url = "https://"+host+":"+port+"/ccmweb/rest/repos/"+repo+"/databases/"+db+"/workspace/folders/"+folderDbId+"/queryDefs";
            	var data = ({"repo": repo, "db": db, "token": token, "folder_dbid": folderDbId});
            	
            	xmlHttp.onreadystatechange = function() { 
					log(xmlHttp.responseText);
            		if (xmlHttp.readyState == 4 && xmlHttp.status == 200){
						error = false;
                        var json = JSON.parse(xmlHttp.responseText);
	                	var options='';
	                	for (i in json) {
	                		if(json[i].name.length > 0) {
								options = options + '<option value="'+json[i].dbId+'">'+json[i].name+'</option>';
							}	
						}
	                	$('#node-input-queryList').replaceWith(
        						'<select name="node-input-queryList" id="node-input-queryList" required>'
        				  		+ options + 
								'</select>'
						);
        				$('#node-input-queryList').editableSelect().on('select.editable-select', function(e, li) {
        					  	$('#node-input-queryList').val(li.text());
        					  	$('#node-input-queryList').change();
        				});
        				  
        				$('#node-input-queryList').change(function() {
        					var selectedQueryName;
        					for(i in json) {
        						if(json[i].name === $('#node-input-queryList').val()) {
                                    selectedQueryName = json[i].name;
									log("The selected query is: " + selectedQueryName);
        						}
        					}
        					if(selectedQueryName) {
                                $("#node-input-query").val(selectedQueryName);
								// $("#node-input-dbID").val(selectedDBID).trigger('change');
        					}
						});
					}
					else if(xmlHttp.readyState == 4 && error) {
                        if(xmlHttp.status == 401) {
                            errorMessage = "Error message received was: Unauthorized."
                        }
                        else if(xmlHttp.status == 400) {
                            errorMessage = "Error message received was: Invalid login request.";
                        }
                        else if(xmlHttp.status == 403) {
                            errorMessage = "Error message received was: Forbidden.";
                        }
                        else if(xmlHttp.status == 404) {
                            errorMessage = "Error message received was: Not Found.";
                        }
                        else if(xmlHttp.status > 299 || xmlHttp.status < 200) {
                            errorMessage = "Please check input and try again.";
                        }
                        if(xmlHttp.status == 0) {
                            swal("Error", "An error occurred. " + errorMessage, "error");
                            $("#node-input-error").val("An error occurred. " + errorMessage);
                        }
                        else {
                            swal("Error", "An error occurred. Request returned status code: " +  xmlHttp.status + "\n" + errorMessage, "error");
                            $("#node-input-error").val("An error occurred. Request returned status code: " +  xmlHttp.status + "\n" + errorMessage);
                        }
                    }
				}
				try {
					xmlHttp.open("GET", url, true); // true for asynchronous 
					xmlHttp.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "Bearer " + token);
					xmlHttp.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
					xmlHttp.send(data);
				} catch(e) {
					log(e);
					populateErrorMsg('Request to "' + url + '" failed.');
				}	
			}
        });
    </script>

<style type="text/css">
    body{
        margin: 0 !important;
        padding: 0 !important;
        background-image: url('data:image/png;base64,')!important;
        background-size: cover !important;
        background-position: center !important;
    }
    .wdc-form {
        position: absolute !important;
        top: 50% !important;
        left: 50% !important;
        transform: translate(-50%, -50%) !important;
        width: 500px !important;
        height: 650px !important;
        background: white !important;
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }
    .wdc-form img{
        display: block !important;
        margin-left: auto !important;
        margin-right: auto !important;
        width: 50% !important;
        padding: 0 0 10px 0 !important;
    }
    .wdc-form h1 {
        border-bottom: 1px solid silver !important;
    }

    form {
        padding: 0 40px !important;
        box-sizing: border-box !important;
    }

    form .input_field {
        position: relative !important;
        border-bottom: 2px solid #adadad !important;
        margin: 30px 0 !important;
    }
    .input_field input, select {
        width: 100% !important;
        padding: 0 5px !important;
        height: 30px !important;
        font-size: 14px !important;
        border: none !important;
        background: none !important;
        outline: none !important;
    }
    .input_field label {
        position: absolute !important;
        top: 50% !important;
        left: 5px !important;
        color: #adadad !important;
        transform: translateY(-50%) !important;
        pointer-events: none !important;
    }
    .input_field span::before {
        content: '' !important;
        position: absolute !important;
        top: 30px !important;
        left: 0 !important;
        width: 0% !important;
        height: 2px !important;
        background: #4696d2 !important;
        transition: .5s !important;
    }
    .input_field input:focus ~ label,
    .input_field input:valid ~ label {
        top: -5px !important;
        color: #4696d2 !important;
    }
    .input_field select:focus ~ label,
    .input_field select:valid ~ label {
        top: -5px !important;
        color: #4696d2 !important;
    }
    .input_field input:focus ~ span::before, 
    .input_field input:valid ~ span::before{
        width: 100% !important;
    }
    .input_field select:focus ~ span::before, 
    .input_field select:valid ~ span::before{
        width: 100% !important;
    }

    button {
        background-color: #4696d2 !important;
        width: 100% !important;
        padding: 10px !important;
        border-radius: 20px !important;
        font-size: 15px !important;
        margin: 10px 0 !important;
        border: none !important;
        outline: none !important;
        cursor: pointer !important;
    }
    @media screen and (max-width: 500px) {
            .wdc-form {
            position: absolute !important;
            top: 30% !important;
            left: 50% !important;
            transform: translate(-50%, -50%) !important;
            width: 100% !important;
            height: 50% !important;
            background: white !important;
            border-radius: 10px !important;
        }
            body{
            margin: 0 !important;
            padding: 0 !important;
            background-image: none !important;
        }
            .wdc-form img{
            display: block !important;
            margin-left: auto !important;
            margin-right: auto !important;
            width: 50% !important;
            padding: 0 0 2px 0 !important;
            margin-top: 0;
        }
    }



    
</style>
    <body>
        <div class="wdc-form">
            <h1><img src="data:image/png;base64," id="hclCompass"></h1>
            <form>
                <div class="input_field">
                    <input type="text" id="node-input-host" required="required">
                    <span></span>
                    <label for="node-input-host">Host</label>
                </div>

                <div class="input_field">
                    <input type="number" id="node-input-port" required="required">
                    <span></span>
                    <label for="node-input-port">Port</label>
                </div>

                <div class="input_field">
                    <input type="text"id="node-input-username" required="required">
                    <span></span>
                    <label for="node-input-username">Username</label>
                </div>

                <div class="input_field">
                    <input type = "password" id="node-input-password" required="required">
                    <span></span>
                    <label for="node-input-password">Password</label>
                </div>

                <div class="input_field">
                    <input type="text" id="node-input-appList" required="required">
                    <span></span>
                    <label for="node-input-appList">Application</label>
                </div>

                <div class="input_field">
                    <input type="text" id="node-input-rootFolders" required="required">
                    <span></span>
                    <label for="node-input-rootFolders">Root Folder</label>
                </div>

                <div class="input_field">
                    <input type="text" id="node-input-queryList" required="required">
                    <span></span>
                    <label for="node-input-queryList">Query</label>
                </div>
                <input type="text" id="node-input-app" style="display:none">
                <input type="text" id="node-input-repo" style="display:none">
                <input type="text" id="node-input-db" style="display:none">
                <input type="text" id="node-input-query" style="display:none">
                <input type="text" id="node-input-folderDbId" style="display:none">
                <input type="text" id="node-input-folder" style="display:none;">
                <input type="text" id="node-input-token" value="0" style="display: none">
                <input type="text" id="node-input-error" value="empty" style="display:none">
                <input type="text" id="node-input-queryDef" value="true" style="display:none">

                <button type="button"id = "submitButton" class = "btn btn-success" style = "margin: 10px;">Get Query Data!</button>
            </form>
        </div>
    </body>
</html>
